content: the breezy buttoned cowl is so easy to make and works up quickly if you re looking for a fun crochet project that looks great with just about any outfit this project is perfect for you you might even find yourself making a few cowls for your friends too purchase this ad-free printable pdf of this pattern for your convenience plus get a bonus crochet tips and tricks pdf - get pattern here 1 1 https //makergoodies com/products/easy-breezy-buttoned-cowl-crochet-pattern
